{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3564856,"name":"Emil","username":"GronkBaby","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/g/ba8739/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-03-21T19:24:23.447Z","cooked":"

Hi everyone,
I’m a bit new to Elastic, and am wondering how I can make a number big on a widget textbox (just like how you can make the match-time text-size really big).

I looked on the Elastic Blog and could not find anything (probably just my bad looking skills ).

Any help would be appreciated

Change the widget’s type to Large Text Display, that has what you’re looking for.
